question: Which paper was the first to propose combining human spoken language and sign language datasets with gloss annotations to enhance the performance of sign language translation?
answer_format: Your answer should be the title of the paper WITHOUT ANY EXPLANATION.

eval_kwargs.question: Which paper was the first to propose combining human spoken language and sign language datasets with gloss annotations to enhance the performance of sign language translation?
eval_kwargs.reference_answer: Neural Machine Translation Methods for Translating Text to Sign Language Glosses
